description:
Our client, an international company, a global group of energy and petrochemicals companies, is looking for “HSE &SD Specialist”.


Requirements:

  • Higher education (Safety Engineer, Industrial Engineer, or Environmental studies or similar);
  • 10 years of relevant experience in the spheres of Manufacturing, Construction, Oil and Gas Exploration & Production business;
  • English level (fluent);
  • Have the ability to handle potentially difficult situations and to arrive at a balanced judgement.
  • Be a team player with well-developed communication and interpersonal skills.

Main responsibilities:

  • Ensures proper safety strategies, systems, policies, standards, and tools are in place and functioning throughout the Company, and provides assurance to the Venture HSSE manager on safety performance;
  • Leverages best practice and implements learning from incidents throughout regional/business/asset.
  • Be focal point for construction and road safety;
  • Promotes the adoption and adherence to international HSE standards, performance and attitudes, and achievement of Company Group quality HSE standards or materially equivalent in principles and standards to those of Company Group;
  • Helps to ensure that there are no gaps in overall HSE&SD coverage across the Company, that all possible risks are identified and addressed pro-actively.

Company proposes:

  • Competitive salary level;
  • Оpportunity to work in multicultural environment;
  • Benefits.
name: HSE &SD Specialist
